306160.name: Dead Bits (Soundtrack)
306160.description:
The original soundtrack of the game Dead Bits, produced by Frost Orb.

Track list:

01 - Frost Orb - Amazing
02 - Frost Orb - Quilly
03 - Frost Orb - Space Travel
04 - Frost Orb - Omega
05 - Frost Orb - Frostbite
06 - Frost Orb - White Days
07 - Frost Orb - Vendaval
08 - Frost Orb - Refresh
09 - Frost Orb - Exploding Bits
10 - Frost Orb - Galaxy Boss
11 - Frost Orb - Ice Cold
12 - Frost Orb - Out of Time
13 - Frost Orb - Jump
14 - Frost Orb - Genius (Dead Bits Theme)
306160.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
